resources.string: You can give us feedback @ icalistus@gmail.com

Weight Gauge helps you know the amount of fat in your body via your body mass index(BMI). It also sees your through a weight normalization process if your BMI falls in the critical regions (Overweight or underweight)
This app was developed by Ilo Calistus.\nYou can contact Calistus @ icalistus@gmail.com\n or +2347039056183
